reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I wanted to suprise my wife with a relaxing break on the the Isle of Wight.. I go there every year to the music festival with friends but I have never had a holiday there. We were both delighted with every thing that was on offer to us, the only thing that wasn't right was the weather and yes we would go again.
reviews.title: superb hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the other listed 5 star reviews speak volumes about this perfect holiday escape. What struck me first of all was how professional and friendly the owners are - Ric & Maggie. You want to wind up inviting the owners out for a drink at the quaint Buddle Inn just down the road - i wish we had. Secondly, what takes your breath away is the Manor's interior decor. If you're into art, as i am, the Manor is a gallery of some of the best and imaginitive pieces of artwork i've ever seen. The artist is a genius - SEE FOR YOURSELF! The rooms are luxurious (ours had a lovely seaview) with en-suite bathrooms and huge plasma TV and their excellently prepared breakfasts suit all tastes. Would we ever go back again? YOU BET!! Keep up the good work Ric & Maggie.
reviews.title: Friendly Manor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the honour of staying with Maggie and Ric for a weekend. The suite we had was amazing - spacious with superb artwork from Josephine Wall, who we had the chance to meet along with her husband.
reviews.title: Love the Artwork!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Maggie and Ric have made The Enchanted Manor a unique experience. They are such friendly hosts, nothing is too much trouble. The breakfasts they provide are excellent - lots of choice and well presented.
reviews.title: A Magical experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The atmosphere is so relaxed - no airs and graces! We felt at home instantly. The beds are really comfortable - long enough to fit a six footer!
reviews.title: Unique and Magical

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ve just got back from an amazing short break at the enchanted manor on the isle of wight .The manor really is very special and its hosts Ric & maggie are 2 of the most hard working and nicest people you could meet and stay with.They have created a beautiful place for people to stay and will arrange most things for you at the drop of a hat and that goes a long way in my experience of travelling and staying in different places.With huge bedrooms with lounge area,en suite shower room and bath area,swimming pool,snooker room,big garden area,hot tubs to name a few this place has everything! and with the enchanted theme thrown in the mix ,the place has a very cheerful buzz about it.
reviews.title: An 'Enchanting' stay!

likes.liked: — the hard work and effort put in to make our stay special

reviews.text: I would recommend this place to any one who wants to go for a break in the isle of wight and is prepared to try something abit different,trust me your love it !
reviews.title: My Enchanted Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wow! What can we say? On the 26th July this year, I married my partner Kirk at The Enchanted Manor.
reviews.title: Fairy Paradise open to all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked our wedding there around 10 months ago, and straight away we knew that the owners Maggie and Ric would be more than happy to help in any way they could! If I needed to ask anything at all, no matter how small, I knew I could give them a ring, pop and see them or email them and they would get straight back to me!
reviews.title: Enchanted by Enchanted Manor Isle of Wight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were amazed by every detail of our special day, it was perfect! The food was outstanding, a fantastic selection of meats, fish and vegetarian options aswell as delicious deserts! The staff were friendly yet professional, nothing was too much trouble! The whole experience was more than we could have ever imagined, I couldnt have asked for more! The setting for our woodland wedding ceremony was beautiful, so different! All of our guests loved the fact that it was so unique. I wouldnt have married anywhere else, it was brilliant.
reviews.title: we had a perfect stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stay here for two nights and had the most amazing time, the room was massive, we had a four poster bed, two bathrooms shower with spray jets, and a cast iron roll top bath, these are in two seprate rooms, living room with flat screen tv, dvd player and radio/ cd player/mp3 player, fridge, and dining area, there is an outdoor pool and hot tub, and bbq and outdoor bar area.
reviews.title: "Absolutely magnificent!"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners Maggie and Ric are such wonderful people and there place is amazing beyond what we expected. the breakfast are wonderful and freshly cooked in the morning by maggie and her staff.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, Excellent Hosts, very relaxing surroundings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the room was very clean, with fresh robes and towels, there were lots of beautful suprises in the room but you will have to go, i dont want to ruin it for you.
reviews.title: Perfect For Formantic Getaway
The Perfect Place to Relax
reviews.text: in great location 10 min drive to main town of ventnor.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ric & maggie thank you for everything, we had such an amazing time and we look forward to coming again soon.
reviews.title: The Best Holiday Ever!

likes.disliked: — A little bit far out,, but the area was STUNNING!! so not really a complaint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only regret about staying at the Enchanted manor was that we were only there for One Night. Ric and Maggie made an exception for us to stay for one night and were really helpful in making the arrangements for us, even the ferry crossing.
reviews.title: Wonderful - we will be back for sure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: To sum up briefly - Wonderful building, fantastic location, beautiful furnishings, attention to detail is so interesting, so many little touches of enchanting curio and paintings. Gardens lovely with lots of interesting bits to discover.
reviews.title: A truley 'Enchanting' experience

likes.liked: — No effort spared in making the accomodation top rate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We never got to meet Maggie but Ric was so welcoming and easy going we felt welcome the minute we arrived.
reviews.title: A truly magical experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Isle of wight is a great place, the sun shone for us which was a bonus. We only saw a bit of the isle in the 1 day we had and when we come back we know where we will be staying already - The Enchanted Manor.
reviews.title: love it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've stayed in lots of nice hotels but this was something totally different - We loved it.
reviews.title: Enchanted by The Enhanted Manor!!!

likes.liked: — everything was to a very high standard
